block.p: In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.
In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.

$325,000 320 West 19th Street 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 620-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; dining area, sunken living room, h/w floors; maintenance $511, 46% tax-deductible; listed at $325,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Silverman Group)

$270,000 118 Waverly Place 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 680-sq.-ft. co-op in a brownstone; eat-in kitchen, high ceilings, h/w floors; maintenance $654, 45% tax-deductible; listed at $299,000, 2 weeks on market (Broker: Eychner Associates)

$475,000 166 East 63rd Street (Beekman Townhouse) 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 790-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, attended elevator, renovated kitchen, marble bath, west exposure; common charge $490; taxes $3,384; listed at $460,000 (multiple bids), 5 weeks on market (Brokers: Halstead Property Co.; Stribling Associates; Douglas Elliman)

$510,000 200 East 69th Street (Trump Place) 1-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 774-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, h/w floors; common charge $739; taxes $4,308; listed at $530,000, 8 weeks on market (Brokers: Corcoran Group; Coldwell Banker/Hunt Kennedy)

$550,000 120 West 70th Street 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,000-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; elevator, high ceilings, h/w floors; maintenance $770, 35% tax-deductible; listed at $550,000, 3 weeks on market (Broker: Halstead Property Co.)

$138,000 334 Newman Avenue 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 65-year-old ranch; dining area, h/w floors, finished basement, 25-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $800; listed at $149,000, 6 weeks on market (Broker: Heritage First)

$274,000 249 West 261st Street 2-family, 70-year-old detached brick house; 2 bedrooms, 1 bath, sun room in each unit; finished basement, 2-car garage, 37-by-98-ft. corner lot; taxes $2,417; listed at $299,000, 8 weeks on market (Broker: Trebach)

$280,000 55 Poplar Street 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 750-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; elevator, c/a, washer/dryer in unit, h/w floors; common charge $414; taxes $3,178; listed at $290,000, 4 weeks on market (Broker: William S. Ross)

$262,000 247 Carlton Avenue 3-bedroom 1 1/2-bath, 850-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; spiral staircase, fireplace; maintenance $450, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $279,000, 2 weeks on market (Broker: Aguayo & Huebener)

$405,000 24 Montgomery Place 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,000-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; dining area, high ceilings, h/w floors, private roof deck; maintenance $548, 64% tax-deductible; listed at $399,000 (multiple bids), 3 weeks on market (Broker: Warren Lewis Realty)

$310,000 7-20 College Place 2-family, 55-year-old detached colonial; 3 bedrooms, 2 baths in primary duplex; 2 bedrooms, 1 bath in other; eat-in kitchens in each, 2-car garage, 32-by-109-ft. lot; taxes $2,045; listed at $339,000, 3 weeks on market (Broker: PCA Realty)

$320,000 71-22 Yellowstone Boulevard 3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 60-year-old semiattached brick house; dining room, eat-in kitchen, finished basement, 1-car garage, 25-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $2,250; listed at $349,000, 7 weeks on market (Broker: Sarah Jones Real Estate)

$205,000 7 Merriman Avenue 3-bedroom, 1-bath, 85-year-old detached house; dining room, eat-in kitchen, full basement, 30-by-96-ft. lot; taxes $1,385; listed at $229,000, 2 weeks on market (Broker: Salmon)

$867,500 20 Cowdin Lane 4-bedroom, 4-bath, 58-year-old ranch; entry hall, fireplace, dining room, den, library, eat-in kitchen, pool, attached 2-car garage, 2.12-acre lot; taxes $14,353; listed at $875,000, 15 weeks on market (Broker: Houlihan/Lawrence)

$475,000 108 Vernon Drive 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 41-year-old split-level; family room, stone fireplace, wet bar, patio, cathedral ceiling, dining room, modern eat-in kitchen, 70-by-125-ft. lot; taxes $12,686; listed at $489,000, 42 weeks on market (Brokers: Prudential Centennial; Prudential Ragette)

$472,000 49 Boulder Ridge 3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 14-year-old town-house condominium; skylights, eat-in kitchen, dining room, sunken living room; common charge $500; taxes $9,900; listed at $489,000, 20 weeks on market (Brokers: Bronxville-Ley; Houlihan/Lawrence)

$1.4 million 61 South Bedford Road 4-bedroom, 4-bath, 64-year-old colonial; library, eat-in kitchen, fireplace, dining room, loft, office, terrace, finished basement, 3.13-acre lot; taxes $10,073; listed at $1.45 million, 3 weeks on market (Brokers: Ginnel; Houlihan/Lawrence)

$182,500 1103 Black Rock Turnpike (Holland Common) 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 1,197-sq.-ft. town-house condo in a 13-year-old complex; corner unit, kitchen with pantry, rear deck; common charge $150; taxes $2,430; listed at $182,500, 7 weeks on market (Brokers: William Pitt; Remax/Heritage)

$876,500 35 Mianus View Terrace (Greyledge) 5-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 104-year-old antique colonial; beamed ceilings, dining room, library, greenhouse, 1-car garage, 0.33-acre lot on cul-de-sac; taxes $5,033; listed at $785,000 (multiple bids), 4 weeks on market (Brokers: Coldwell Banker/Greenwich; Anderson Associates)

$355,000 44 Cobblestone Drive 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 4-year-old colonial; entry foyer with marble floor, family room, finished basement, vaulted ceilings in master suite, 0.62-acre lot; taxes $6,501; listed at $359,000, 2 weeks on market (Broker: Press-Cuozzo)

$477,500 190 Minosa Circle 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 44-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen with pantry, family room, 2-car garage, 1.04-acre lot; taxes $6,501; listed at $489,900, 7 weeks on market (Broker: Prudential Connecticut)

$390,000 30 Wesley Drive 4-bedroom, 2-bath, 46-year-old ranch; dining room, eat-in kitchen, den, finished basement, 1-car attached garage, 65-by-118-ft. lot; taxes $8,000; listed at $389,000 (multiple bids), 2 weeks on market (Broker: Jan Kalman)

$375,000 82 Duck Pond Road 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 40-year-old high ranch; dining room, eat-in kitchen, den, family room, enclosed porch, fireplace, 2-car attached garage, 0.5-acre lot; taxes $8,400; listed at $425,000, 7 weeks on market (Broker: Harmonious Homes)

$639,000 72 Oakland Avenue 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath new colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, den, 60-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $9,000; listed at $639,000, 5 weeks on market (Brokers: Goodstein Harbor Town; Coldwell Banker Sammis)
$247,500 11 Waverly Place 3-bedroom, 3-bath, 30-year-old ranch; eat-in kitchen, study, c/a, brick patio, 134-by-179-ft. lot; taxes $6,226; listed at $249,900, 1 day on market (Broker: Weichert)

$150,000 50 Seaview Avenue 4-bedroom, 2-bath, 40-year-old colonial; eat-in-kitchen, full basement, terrace, parking for three cars, 33-by-92-ft. lot; taxes $3,110; listed at $150,000, 4 weeks on market (Broker: Coldwell Banker)

$399,900 13 Buchanan Way 5-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 12-year-old colonial; eat-in kitchen, den, deck, 2-car garage, 0.65-acre lot; taxes $8,080; listed at $399,900, 3 months on market (Broker: Prudential New Jersey)

Correction: August 27, 2000, Sunday A picture in the Residential Sales report last Sunday, with the entry for 11 Waverly place in Aberdeen, N.J., was published in error. It was a duplicate of the one that appeared, correctly, with the listing for 49 Boulder Ridge in Greenburgh, N.Y.

A picture in the Residential Sales report last Sunday, with the entry for 11 Waverly place in Aberdeen, N.J., was published in error. It was a duplicate of the one that appeared, correctly, with the listing for 49 Boulder Ridge in Greenburgh, N.Y.
